title: Gears Goes Next-Gen, PS5 Shortage Until 2022 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.10.21
description:
Blessing and Tim kick off the week by talking about what looks to be a SLOW BURN for next-gen. Let's talk about PS5 shortages, Gears going to Unreal Engine 5, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping

It’s Monday which means we got a drop of new content that went live!

Over the weekend Xcast went live featuring Sean Capri (Sean like Connery, Capri like the pants) of The Xbox Drive.

Episode 2 of our Star Wars: The Bad Batch Reactions also went up over the weekend.

This morning, a new highlight video of Andy and I’s Resident Evil 7 playthrough went live. Edited by the one and only Roger Pokorny.

And then the Kinda Funny Podcast is now live as of this morning titled “What Animals Can We Ride?”

Tuesday at 11AM PT right here on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames we are partnering with Razer to show off the RTX 30-series powered Blade laptops with Andy and the boys playing some Warzone

The Roper Report -
00:07:38 - PlayStation 5 supply is gonna be tight even until next year - Takashi Mochizuki @ Bloomberg
00:16:25 - Gears Developer, The Coalition is moving to next-gen development and Unreal Engine 5 - Press Release
00:20:51 - What other game/genre/IP would you like them to work on? - Best Friends Q:dhruvenator
00:34:45 - Ad  
00:38:45 - Is this a path to success that you think more 3rd party games might follow? - Benjamin Berry
00:42:45 - Ubisoft will now brand all its own games as "Ubisoft Originals" - Tom Phillips @ Eurogamer
00:47:50 - Capcom Continues to keep killing it in sales - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
00:57:10 - More Court Document Leaks: Epic Games offered $200m deal to Sony for ‘up to 6’ PC PlayStation ports - Andy Robinson @ VGC
01:01:20 - Out today
01:03:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Greg and Whitta
itunes:author: Kinda Funny

content:encoded:
Blessing and Tim kick off the week by talking about what looks to be a SLOW BURN for next-gen. Let's talk about PS5 shortages, Gears going to Unreal Engine 5, and more.


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:02:00 - Housekeeping

  • It’s Monday which means we got a drop of new content that went live!
  • Over the weekend Xcast went live featuring Sean Capri (Sean like Connery, Capri like the pants) of The Xbox Drive.
  • Episode 2 of our Star Wars: The Bad Batch Reactions also went up over the weekend.
  • This morning, a new highlight video of Andy and I’s Resident Evil 7 playthrough went live. Edited by the one and only Roger Pokorny.
  • And then the Kinda Funny Podcast is now live as of this morning titled “What Animals Can We Ride?”
  • Tuesday at 11AM PT right here on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames we are partnering with Razer to show off the RTX 30-series powered Blade laptops with Andy and the boys playing some Warzone

The Roper Report -

00:07:38 - PlayStation 5 supply is gonna be tight even until next year - Takashi Mochizuki @ Bloomberg

00:16:25 - Gears Developer, The Coalition is moving to next-gen development and Unreal Engine 5 - Press Release

00:20:51 - What other game/genre/IP would you like them to work on? - Best Friends Q:dhruvenator

00:34:45 - Ad  

00:38:45 - Is this a path to success that you think more 3rd party games might follow? - Benjamin Berry

00:57:10 - More Court Document Leaks: Epic Games offered $200m deal to Sony for ‘up to 6’ PC PlayStation ports - Andy Robinson @ VGC
